VI.iii.3.C.1.b
.
Responsibility for Approving Administrative Decisions
Veterans Service Center Managers and Pension Management Center Managers or their designated reviewers are responsible for approving all administrative decisions regarding a contested claim.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section C - Authorizing and Notifying Claimants of a Decision on a Contested Claim
